name: HPI_CapabilityStatement
title: Capability Statement describing HPI FHIR APIs
description: This is the computable resource that describes the RESTful endpoint

interaction.documentation: Used to retrieve a Practitioner resource by Id.

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: Not case sensitive

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Will only return active identifiers

searchParam.name: birthdate
searchParam.documentation: This is a custom search

searchParam.name: ra-identifier
searchParam.documentation: This is a custom search. It queries on the identifier suplied by the Registartion Authority (Practitioner.qualification.identifier)

interaction.documentation: Used to retrieve a PractitionerRole resource by Id.

searchParam.name: practitioner
searchParam.documentation: Given a Practitoner id, returns the PractitonerRoles associated with that id

searchParam.name: organization
searchParam.documentation: Given a Organization id, returns the PractitonerRoles associated with that id

searchParam.name: location
searchParam.documentation: Given a Location id, returns the PractitonerRoles associated with that id

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Returns PractitionerRoles based on identifier

searchParam.name: role
searchParam.documentation: Returns PractitionerRoles based on role

searchParam.name: active
searchParam.documentation: To enable exclusion of inactive PractitionerRoles

interaction.documentation: Used to retrieve an Organization resource by Id.

searchParam.name: active
searchParam.documentation: Will only return active organizations

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: Will only return active organizations

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: The HPI Organization id.

searchParam.name: partOf
searchParam.documentation:
Locates Organizations that are 'part of' another. For example, [host]/Organization?partOf=cmdhb would return all Organizations
like hospitals that are part of the Organization with the id 'cmdhd'

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Retrieve the Location with the identifier

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: Retrieve the Locations with the matching name

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: Retrieve Locations of the given type

searchParam.name: address
searchParam.documentation: Retrieve the Locations by address

searchParam.name: organization
searchParam.documentation: Locations with the given ManagingOrganization

searchParam.name: dhb
searchParam.documentation: Locations that are in a DHBs catchment area. This is a custom search

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The current status of the Location
